properties.areaDesc: Franklin, MO; Montgomery, MO; Gasconade, MO; Osage, MO; Warren, MO
properties.headline: Tornado Warning issued January 10 at 6:09PM CST until January 10 at 6:45PM CST by NWS St Louis MO
properties.description:
The National Weather Service in St Louis has issued a

* Tornado Warning for...
Southern Montgomery County in east central Missouri...
Northwestern Franklin County in east central Missouri...
Northeastern Osage County in central Missouri...
Central Warren County in east central Missouri...
Northern Gasconade County in east central Missouri...

* Until 645 PM CST.

* At 609 PM CST, a severe thunderstorm capable of producing a tornado
was located 8 miles north of Mount Sterling, moving northeast at 60
mph.

HAZARD...Tornado.

SOURCE...Radar indicated rotation.

IMPACT...Flying debris will be dangerous to those caught without
shelter. Mobile homes will be damaged or destroyed.
Damage to roofs, windows, and vehicles will occur.  Tree
damage is likely.

* This dangerous storm will be near...
Swiss around 615 PM CST.
Hermann and Big Spring around 625 PM CST.
Jonesburg around 635 PM CST.
Warrenton and Truesdale around 640 PM CST.

Other locations impacted by this tornadic thunderstorm include
Gasconade, Berger, Americus, Morrison, High Hill, Holstein, Bay,
McKittrick and Rhineland.

This also includes Deutschheim Historic Site.

This includes Interstate 70 in Missouri between exits 179 and 193.
properties.instruction:
TAKE COVER NOW! Move to a basement or an interior room on the lowest
floor of a sturdy building. Avoid windows. If you are outdoors, in a
mobile home, or in a vehicle, move to the closest substantial shelter
and protect yourself from flying debris.

CMAMtext: NWS: TORNADO WARNING in this area til 6:45 PM CST. Take shelter now. Check media.
